message: "NEW REPORT: Data from the National Human Trafficking Hotline identified nearly 800 individual victims of human trafficking holding guest worker visas from 2015 to 2017."

data.description:
NEW REPORT: Data from the National Human Trafficking Hotline identified nearly 800 individual victims of human trafficking holding guest worker visas from 2015 to 2017. Foreign workers entering the United States with hopes of a stable job and paycheck are instead being victimized by threat of deportation and economic control. Learn more in our disturbing new report detailing how human traffickers are exploiting workers on temporary work visas largely through tactics that are built into U.S. visa programs: https://polarisproject.org/human-trafficking-temporary-work-visas-data-analysis-2015-2017 

#humantrafficking #labortrafficking
